sentences.en: Dido: a mischievous prank or antic; a caper.
sentences.cn: 胡闹: 一种调皮的恶作剧或胡闹; 鬼把戏.

sentences.en: Finish: gold, silver, antic silver, antic bronze, copper.
sentences.cn: 外观电镀: 镀金, 镀银, 镀古银, 镀古青铜, 镀铜等.

sentences.en: Hamlet's assumed antic disposition; fantastic Halloween costumes; a grotesque reflection in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 哈姆莱特采取的奇怪安排; 奇形怪状的万圣节服装; 镜子里奇怪的映象.

sentences.en: I call him an antic old man.
sentences.cn: 我称他是个古怪的老头。

sentences.en: Moreover , Saito ( 1991 ) proposes extraposition to antic - command requirement, which seems to be violated in some instances.
sentences.cn: 认为某些看似违反 反 成分统制要求的例证可以用附加语外置的方式得到解释.

sentences.en: So we mixed with some antic elements. For instance, the obese bloomers and the large collar.
sentences.cn: 所以其中融入了一些小丑的元素, 比如说肥大的灯笼裤,大领子.

sentences.en: The clown came on with many antic gestures.
sentences.cn: 小丑上场表演许多滑稽动作.

trans.tran_cn: 古怪的，滑稽的，哗众取宠的
傻里傻气的举动，滑稽的动作，古怪的姿势
